description: Cumulative counting sequence: method B (noun,adjective)-pairs with first term 1.
comments: Segments (generated as at A055168):  1; 1,1; 1,3; 1,4,3,1; 1,6,3,2,4,1; ...  Conjecture: every positive integer occurs.
example: Write 1, thus having 1 once, thus having 1 3 times, thus having 1 4 times and 3 once, etc.
mathematica: s = {1}; Do[s = Flatten[{s, {#,Count[s, #]} & /@ DeleteDuplicates[s]}], {24}]; s (* Peter Moses, Mar 21 2013 *)
author: _Clark Kimberling_, Apr 27 2000
